justification: Vendor 2 details 'an integrated Digital Twin Instance Repository' that 'supports real-time capture and synchronization of asset state data with the digital twin model,' which directly addresses the storage, management, and retrieval of digital twin instance data. However, while the text implies retrieval with 'synchronization,' explicit mention of retrieval mechanisms is slightly lacking. Interfaces (OPC UA, MQTT, REST APIs) suggest management and access without detailing retrieval operations.
ability: The ability to store, manage and retrieve digital twin instance data that conforms to the requirements of the digital twin model
